thread.title: Devrim Özkan and Lucas Torreira romance ends after a heated argument over her spending 3 million TL on luxury items | Al Bawaba
thread.title_full: Devrim Özkan and Lucas Torreira romance ends after a heated argument over her spending 3 million TL on luxury items | Al Bawaba

author: zaid_qaissieh
title: Devrim Özkan and Lucas Torreira romance ends after a heated argument over her spending 3 million TL on luxury items | Al Bawaba
text: ALBAWABA - Galatasaray player Lucas Torreira and actress Devrim Özkan split up. Lucas Torreira and his boyfriend Devrim Özkan's renowned love story has come to a close. Was the breakup between Devrim Özkan and Torreira finalized, and what caused it? The renowned romance between Lucas Torreira, star of Galatasaray, a prominent Super League team, and his boyfriend Devrim Özkan has come to an end. The renowned footballer allegedly got into a heated argument with the stunning actress because her extravagant desires caused him financial difficulties. For some time, Torreira had harbored feelings for the renowned actor Devrim Özkan. Recently, the pair went on a little getaway to the Aegean Sea, where they spent New Year's Eve together. It was a shock to the pair when each other unfollowed them on Instagram after they had just posted heartfelt comments about loving one another. Photos of Torreira and Devrim Özkan shot together were also deleted from their profiles. An argument terminated Devrim Özkan and Torreira's love, according to Müge Dağıstanlı, host of the Aramızda Kalmasın show. Rumor has it that the sound of yelling and fighting roused everyone from their slumber at Torreira's house in the wee hours of the morning. The football player became worn out of Devrim Özkan's extravagant and never-ending demands. The demands of Devrim Özkan, including a $400,000 watch, luxury shoes, and bags, added up to 3 million TL to Torreira's costs.
